version_description:
New in version 4:
- larger game controls (improving gameplay)
- instantly see your international ranking
- higher quality retro graphics
- optimized 4" wide screen support
- more ways to share your highscore
- option to print your highscore using AirPrint (really!)

I hope you like this new version, I really wanted to do the iPhone 5 version well. It has it's very own graphics now, much more detailed and crisp than before. It took hours of testing to improve gameplay and make the game more fun. I hope you'll enjoy it!

Cheers from Amsterdam, Willem.

- Removed the (annoying) banners from the game screen
- Introducing the famous 3210, 8210 and 8850!
- Improvements for newest iOS versions

New game modes, now includes Snake 2!
Translated into 30+ languages.
Optimized memory usage and touch controls.
Please leave a review if you like this update, thanks!

Big update, featuring:
- 5 original and two new larger game modes (3410 / 7110)
- optimized graphics (including iPhone X and Plus models)
- greatly improved responsiveness of the touch controls
- feel the gameplay thanks to vibration feedback (if your device supports it)
- play in wide screen (entire screen is a button)
- pause anytime by touching the center of the virtual screen
- support for hardware (iPad / Bluetooth) keyboards
- iPad split screen support
- world wide highscores and ranking (all platforms)
Please leave a review to let me know if you like this update, thanks!

- New: share game results with awesome screenshots
- Optimised graphics for new iPhones and iPads
- Bug fixes in gameplay and loading
- Added translations
